Sentencas: Bi-layered cathodes with the LSM/LSM-YSZ structure for solid oxide fuel cells were successfully formed on the carbon-sputtered surface of a YSZ sheet by electrophoretic deposition (EPD).
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The thicknesses of the first layer of LSM-YSZ (LY) and the second layer of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) could be controlled by adjusting the deposition time in the EPD process.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cathodic properties of the bi-layered structures were superior to those of the mono-layered structures, and were dependent on the thickness of each layer.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Decreasing the thickness of the first layer and increasing that of the second layer tended to reduce both polarization and ohmic resistances.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The optimal thickness of the first layer at the operating temperature of 600 degrees C was 4 mu m, suggesting that an effective three-phase boundary was extended from the interface between the electrolyte and cathode film to around 4 mu m thickness.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell
Electrophoretic deposition of bi-layered LSM/LSM-YSZ cathodes for solid oxide fuel cell
